video.title: Baby Daddy
video.synopsis: Ben unexpectedly becomes a parent when an ex-girlfriend drops off a baby girl. But with help from friends and family, he steps into the role of dad.

episodes.synopsis: Twenty-something Ben decides to give parenting a shot.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Ben and the boys come up with a fool-proof babysitting schedule.
episodes.title: I Told You So

episodes.synopsis: Ben hits it off with Emma's nurse.
episodes.title: The Nurse and the Curse

episodes.synopsis: Bonnie's presence at the boys' apartment disrupts their routine.
episodes.title: Guys, Interrupted

episodes.synopsis: A potential new boss assumes Ben and Riley are married.
episodes.title: Married to the Job

episodes.synopsis: Riley is voted team captain of Ben's softball team.
episodes.title: Take Her Out of the Ballgame

episodes.synopsis: Ben and Tucker are at odds when they date the same girl.
episodes.title: May the Best Friend Win

episodes.synopsis: Ben gets inspired to clean up is act. Riley, Bonnie, and Emma go shopping.
episodes.title: The Daddy Whisperer

episodes.synopsis: Ben tries to get his Dad to be part of the Christmas photo for Emma. Danny old high-school journal is founded by Riley and Tucker.
episodes.title: A Wheeler Family Christmas Outing

episodes.synopsis: Riley is ready to perform her Maid of honor duties for Katie. Ben decides to spice up the wedding.
episodes.title: Something Borrowed, Something Ben

episodes.synopsis: After discovering that Ben kissed another girl at the wedding, Riley is convinced that Ben is "that guy."
episodes.title: I'm Not That Guy

episodes.synopsis: Riley is dating the seemingly-perfect Fitch, but Ben thinks that Fitch is married and wants to warn Riley.
episodes.title: There's Something Fitchy Going On

episodes.synopsis: Ben hears about an energy drink endorsement opportunity for Danny and decides that he wants to take the lead on making it happen. Bonnie is reluctant, and doesn't think that Ben should jump blindly into such a tricky career decision for Danny.
episodes.title: The Wheeler and the Dealer

episodes.synopsis: Bonnie is moving into the city, right across the hall from the boys. Ben and the others slowly start to take advantage of having a "mom" nearby, much to Bonnie's dismay.
episodes.title: New Bonnie vs. Old Ben

episodes.synopsis: Ben has his eye on Tucker's co-worker Jenna. Danny starts seeing the team shrink, Dr. Amy Shaw, in hopes of discovering what's distracting him from hockey.
episodes.title: The Slump

episodes.synopsis: Ben tries to find a daycare for Emma, but the only way that he can get her on the list is if he is gay. Lying by omission, he allows the cute daycare worker Megan to think that he and Tucker are a couple.
episodes.title: Ben's Big Gay-care Adventure

episodes.synopsis: When Emma's stuffed animal goes missing, Ben is convinced that their new neighbor Kayla stole it for her son. Ben turns out to be right, and the boys scheme to steal back the lamb. Riley's mom comes to visit, and Bonnie comes to Riley's defense when she gives Riley a hard time.
episodes.title: On the Lamb-y

episodes.synopsis: Riley plans to end her relationship with Fitch, but discovers that he died in Africa. Realizing how much she meant to Fitch, Riley plays the greiving widow while helping plan Fitch's memorial service. Danny attempts to remind her that she wasn't in love with Fitch, but it takes Fitch returning to wake her up. Meanwhile, Ben is smitten with girlfriend Megan, but mistakes his feelings for "love", making Megan very uncomfortable.
episodes.title: Never Ben in Love

episodes.synopsis: Tucker and his ex-girlfriend, Vanessa, start up their relationship again, much to Ben's horror. Ben and Vanessa have been at odds since the day they metÑand their rivalry becomes even more pronounced when Vanessa gets an event planning job at Ben's bar. Danny tries to set Riley up with Gerard, his team's new goalie, but through a misunderstanding, Gerard and Bonnie think that Danny was trying to set the two of them up instead.
episodes.title: All's Flair in Love and War

episodes.synopsis: Riley questions her future after taking the bar exam. Danny's girlfriend's father visits to get to know him better.
episodes.title: Test Anxiety

episodes.synopsis: Ben's girlfriend's dog is stolen while under his care. Riley tries to get her old job back with Bonnie's help.
episodes.title: Whatever Lola Wants

episodes.synopsis: Everyone gets together for Emma's christening - including Ben's dad. Ben tasks Riley with choosing Emma's godfather.
episodes.title: The Christening

episodes.synopsis: Ben starts to wonder if he and Riley would make a good couple. Bonnie and Tucker participate in the Rangers' mascot competition, much to Danny's chagrin.
episodes.title: All Riled Up

episodes.synopsis: Ben and Tucker set up a rival playgroup when they find out Emma was excluded from their neighbor's group. Amy suspects Danny has feelings for Riley.
episodes.title: The Emma Dilemma

episodes.synopsis: Ben throws Riley a birthday party. Bonnie and Tucker track down Emma's mother to sign custody papers.
episodes.title: Surprise!

episodes.synopsis: Ben is on a mission to find the most popular toy for Emma's first Christmas, but all the stores are sold out.
episodes.title: Emma's First Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Ben and Riley try to transition from friendship to being a couple. Ben is still angry with Bonnie for bringing Emma’s mom back into their lives.
episodes.title: The Naked Truth

episodes.synopsis: Angela's been crashing in the boys’ apartment in order to spend more time with Emma and get closer to Ben, which strains Ben and Riley’s relationship.
episodes.title: The Lying Game

episodes.synopsis: Tucker books Danny on a talk show. Ben and Riley both decide to rebound with their exes.
episodes.title: Lights! Camera! No Action!

episodes.synopsis: Riley has to mind a client's daughter. Ben inadvertently sabotages Bonnie's new real estate job. Danny and Tucker make a bet to swear off women.
episodes.title: Bonnie's Unreal Estate

episodes.synopsis: The guys scheme to keep their rooftop beach by overthrowing the current apartment board president.
episodes.title: Life's a Beach

episodes.synopsis: Riley uses Danny in an attempt to impress a friendly adversary. Bonnie needs a new business slogan.
episodes.title: Romancing the Phone

episodes.synopsis: Ben makes a bet with Riley that he'll be able to get a date with Riley's friend, Heather. Bonnie becomes caught between Brad and his father.
episodes.title: The Bet

episodes.synopsis: Tucker tries to deceive his father by pretending he's a lawyer. A trip to a Renaissance fair leads to subway shenanigans.
episodes.title: A Knight to Remember

episodes.synopsis: Ben threatens Riley's new relationship -- and Philip's job -- when he pretends to be the British professor and flirts with his students.
episodes.title: Go Brit or Go Home

episodes.synopsis: A horrified Ben realizes he dated Tucker’s new girlfriend. Riley's boss asks her to participate in the firm’s spa day, but Bonnie is also included.
episodes.title: An Affair Not to Remember

episodes.synopsis: Ben realizes that the animated young woman Bonnie fixed him up with is like a miniature version of his mother.
episodes.title: The Wingmom

episodes.synopsis: Ben pulls out all the stops to give Emma the perfect first birthday party at an ice cream parlor. Danny learns a dark secret about Riley's family.
episodes.title: Send in the Clowns

episodes.synopsis: A lovesick Bonnie realizes how much she misses her ex-boyfriend, Brad, and turns to Tucker for help in reuniting with her true love.
episodes.title: Play it Again, Bonnie

episodes.synopsis: Ben tries to score Bon Jovi tickets for Bonnie. Riley and Danny act as prom chaperones at their old high school.
episodes.title: Livin' On a Prom

episodes.synopsis: With help from Ben, Riley searches for her biological father. Bonnie tries to loosen up Tucker's uptight father.
episodes.title: From Here to Paternity

episodes.synopsis: Philip's sister, Georgie, is less than impressed with Riley. Bonnie's actions threaten Danny's career.
episodes.title: Curious Georgie

episodes.synopsis: Ben, Danny and Riley reexamine their lives after unearthing their old time capsule. Riley and Tucker crash Bonnie's dance class.
episodes.title: Flirty Dancing

episodes.synopsis: Unaware that Ben had been hiding money in the foosball table, Bonnie sells it to a fraternity. Ben and Tucker pose as pledges to get the cash back.
episodes.title: Foos It or Loos It

episodes.synopsis: Ben hopes to rekindle his romance with Riley when he joins her on a train trip to Florida.
episodes.title: All Aboard the Love Train

episodes.synopsis: Bonnie is livid when her former New Jersey neighborhood resurrects the Block Party Olympics that she created.
episodes.title: You Can't Go Home Again

episodes.synopsis: Ben, Danny and Tucker wind up in jail after crashing a Halloween bachelorette party, and Riley tries to out-prank Tucker and the Wheelers.
episodes.title: Strip or Treat

episodes.synopsis: Weary of holiday hustle and bustle, Ben wishes Christmas didn't exist. He gets his wish -- but with unintended consequences.
episodes.title: It's a Wonderful Emma

episodes.synopsis: A furtive love note illuminates the tangled romantic ties between Ben, Riley and Danny. Meanwhile, Bonnie starts a baby-sitting business.
episodes.title: She Loves Me, She Loves Me Note

episodes.synopsis: Worried about their languishing relationship, Riley and Ben consult a psychic. Meanwhile, Danny holes up at Brad's place but pretends to be in Paris.
episodes.title: I See Crazy People

episodes.synopsis: After Riley and Ben endure a mugging, Tucker persuades them to appear on Mary Hart's show to discuss the experience.
episodes.title: Mugging for the Camera

episodes.synopsis: Ben and Tucker scheme to get Bonnie out of their place and back into hers, and Danny lands a role on a popular soap opera.
episodes.title: Over My Dead Bonnie

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Ben each try to find the perfect date for Bonnie, while Riley and Tucker get a little too involved in Sondra's marriage troubles.
episodes.title: The Mother of All Dates

episodes.synopsis: After Sondra breaks up with Tucker, Danny schemes to reunite him with an old flame. Meanwhile, Riley racks up charges on the company account.
episodes.title: House of Cards

episodes.synopsis: During Fleet Week, Ben and Tucker pose as sailors to hit on women, and Riley gets jealous when a friend shows romantic interest in Danny.
episodes.title: An Officer and a Gentle Ben

episodes.synopsis: While arranging Bonnie's birthday party, Ben lets slip a family secret about Danny. Emma gets a boo-boo while in the care of Riley and Tucker.
episodes.title: Happy Birthday Two You

episodes.synopsis: Bonnie and Brad tangle over who gets to sell Jon Bon Jovi's penthouse, and Danny worries that Ben has romantic designs on Robyn.
episodes.title: You Give Real Estate a Bad Name

episodes.synopsis: Riley decides to tell Danny how she feels about him. Ben and Bonnie create a phony secret admirer for Tucker, but she turns out to be not so phony.
episodes.title: A Love/Fate Relationship
